title: password
body: I can not remember mz password... and I already did what l was told and will not go to the email to have a new password ?how do i do it?

replies.body: We can help update your account information and assist in recovery.  Reach out to us in a [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416).  Our account team can help you individually!
